appInfo.name: JSON Translation Tool
appInfo.description: An AI-powered JSON internationalization translation tool helping developers quickly complete multilingual translation tasks

fileUpload.title: File Upload
fileUpload.description: Supports both drag-and-drop and click-to-upload methods, accepts JSON files up to 10MB in size

translation.title: AI Translation
translation.description: Utilizes OpenAI's GPT model for intelligent translation, ensuring accuracy of technical terms and natural expression
features: Supports HTML tags and Markdown format

userInterface.title: User Interface
userInterface.description: Clean and intuitive operation interface with real-time preview and editing capabilities

components.preview: Side-by-side comparison preview, supporting real-time view of source and translated text
components.editor: Supports JSON formatting and syntax highlighting
components.progress: Displays translation progress and remaining time

apiKey.description: API key is only used temporarily in the browser and is never saved or transmitted to servers
